original: @219a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @219a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: dhva dz'a gra ke y'u r'a s'a dha nam /
analyzed: dhva dz'a gra ke y'u r'a s'a dha nam /
translated: Dhvajāgrakeyūrasādhana

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi sgrub thabs /
analyzed: rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi sgrub thabs /
translated: Victory Banner Peak Armlet Sādhana

original: rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to Victory Banner Peak Armlet.

original: rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan sku mdog nag mo /
analyzed: rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan sku mdog nag mo /
translated: Victory Banner Peak Armlet is black-colored,

original: zhal gsum pa /
analyzed: zhal gsum pa /
translated: with three faces,

original: phyag bzhi pa /
analyzed: phyag bzhi pa /
translated: and four arms.

original: dmar po dang ljang gu ni g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal lo //
analyzed: dmar po dang ljang gu ni g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal lo //
translated: The right and left faces are red and green.

original: phyag g-yas pa gnyis na ral gri dang / zhags pa'o //
analyzed: phyag g-yas pa gnyis na ral gri dang / zhags pa'o //
translated: In the two right hands are a sword and a noose.

original: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i kha t'am ga dang / 'khor lo dag phyag g-yon pa dag na bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i kha t'am ga dang / 'khor lo dag phyag g-yon pa dag na bsnams pa'o //
translated: In the two left hands are a khaṭvāṅga marked with a vajra and a chakram.

original: dbu skra kham pa gyen du brdzes pa /
analyzed: dbu skra kham pa gyen du brdzes pa /
translated: The tawny hair is bound upward.

original: thod pa skam po lngas dbu brgyan pa /
analyzed: thod pa skam po lngas dbu brgyan pa /
translated: The head is adorned with five dry skulls.

original: stag gi bags pa'i sham thabs can /
analyzed: stag gi bags pa'i sham thabs can /
translated: There is a tiger-skin skirt.

original: zhal mche ba gtsigs shing lto 'phyang ba /
analyzed: zhal mche ba gtsigs shing lto 'phyang ba /
translated: The face bares fangs and hangs down.

original: nyi ma'i gdan la zhabs g-yon brkyang gis bzhugs pa /
analyzed: nyi ma'i gdan la zhabs g-yon brkyang gis bzhugs pa /
translated: The left leg is extended on a sun seat.

original: 'od zer dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: 'od zer dang ldan pa'o //
translated: It is endowed with light rays.

original: gos ser po'i sha 'gag can /
analyzed: gos ser po'i sha 'gag can /
translated: He wears a yellow silken shawl.

original: sa bon ni h'um yig go //
analyzed: sa bon ni h'um yig go //
translated: The seed syllable is hūṃ.

original: mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan pa can no //
analyzed: mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan pa can no //
translated: He is crowned with Akṣobhya.

original: rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The sādhana of the Armlet of the Victory Banner is complete.
